arts.ttl: La Liga Round Up: Lo Celso is Betis’ hero again as Sevilla snatch Athletic Club draw
arts.sum: Sunday’s La Liga action included two late draws as Sevilla held Athletic Club in Bilbao and Celta Vigo battled back at home to Girona. Giovani Lo Celso was the hero again for Real Betis as they won at home to Espanyol. Celta Vigo 1-1 Girona Chances were at a premium in the early stages in […] The post La Liga Round Up: Lo Celso is Betis’ hero again as Sevilla snatch Athletic Club draw appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Leicester City transfer news: Sevilla interested in Foxes midfielder?
arts.sum: Sevilla are reportedly considering a loan move for out-of-favour Leicester City midfielder Boubakary Soumare during the upcoming January transfer window.

arts.ttl: Arsenal to face SHOCK rival for Nico Williams transfer
arts.sum: Arsenal could face shock interest from a Premier League rival to sign Nico Williams next summer, with Manchester United reportedly entering the race for the Athletic Bilbao winger. Williams was a top target for Arsenal and Barcelona this summer but the winger opted to remain with Athletic Club for another season despite the strong pursuit of some of Europe’s major sides.
